bullets: Core member of Volkswagen’s digital team working on the vw.com platform website, built on Adobe Experience Manager, LESS, Backbone.js and Bootstrap.
Responsible for regular site maintenance, with careful consideration for brand standards and legal requirements.
Responsible for regular maintenance of VW’s Field Manager iPad app, used nationwide by dealers to capture lead information at auto shows.
Work closely with Creative and UX designers to develop new core features of the site.
Work in an Agile environment with key stakeholders.
Slice pixel-perfect images from PSDs with keen attention to detail and careful consideration for image optimization and site performance.

Utilized cutting edge HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript techniques to hand code websites, website rebuilds, one-page applications, Facebook applications, and internal applications for the following clients:
  • Hot Pockets
  • Nestea
  • Nestlé Pure Life
  • Butterfinger
  • Nestlé Waters North America
Refined and iterated cross-platform user experiences by developing mobile responsive or mobile adaptive websites for clients.
Used jQuery and AJAX to create dynamic, fast, and responsive web applications.
Leveraged the ASP.NET MVC framework and C# in order to develop modular and scalable applications.
Create custom tempates and functions for the TWIGG How-To website built on WordPress and Sage starter theme.
Implement Google Analytics, Google AdSense and SEO best practices to expand the brand’s audience reach.
Assist in the monitoring and reporting on website traffic and performance.
Workflow tools include: SASS, Bootstrap, jQuery, Gulp and Git.
